text: "Landslide" is a 1975 song by British American band Fleetwood Mac and is the eighth track from their 10th studio album Fleetwood Mac. The live version went to number 51 in the United States in 1997 following its release of the 1997 live album The Dance. It has been covered by The Smashing Pumpkins in 1994 and The Chicks in 2003 for their sixth studio album Home. It went to number 6 in Australia, number 2 in Canada and number 7 in the United States. ==Track listings== US and Canadian CD single # "Landslide" (album version) – 3:49 # "Landslide" (the Sheryl Crow remix) – 3:47 Australian CD single # "Landslide" (the Sheryl Crow remix) # "Landslide" # "Landslide" (live from the Kodak Theater) # "Landslide" (video version) European maxi-CD single # "Landslide" (album version) – 3:49 # "Long Time Gone" – 4:08 # "Landslide" (the Sheryl Crow remix) – 3:47 # "Landslide" (the Sheryl Crow remix—video) – 3:45 UK CD single # "Landslide" (the Sheryl Crow remix) – 3:47 # "Landslide" (album version) – 3:49 # "Landslide" (live from the Kodak Theater) – 4:07 # "Landslide" (the Sheryl Crow remix—video version) – 3:45 ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Folk ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Folk rock songs Category:Fleetwood Mac songs Category:The Smashing Pumpkins songs Category:The Chicks songs Category:Miley Cyrus songs Category:Harry Styles songs
